amendment.description: To amend the Buy American Act to require each Federal agency to submit reports regarding purchases of items made outside of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 127 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 127 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1045-1046) To amend the Buy American Act to require each Federal agency to submit reports regarding purchases of items made outside of the United States, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 127 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 127 proposed by Senator Kennedy for Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 100.
